content:
Undone waves are a great way to add some effortless chic to your look. It's a perfect hairstyle for a casual dinner with friends.

And wow, what a steal on those BP. tops! $10 each is an amazing deal. BP. is known for their trendy and affordable clothing, and it sounds like you scored some great finds. You can never go wrong with a few versatile tops in your wardrobe, and at that price, you can't beat it.

I'm sure you'll look great in your new boots, dark jeans, fitted white top, and undone waves. You've got a perfect casual-chic outfit going on. Just add some minimal accessories, like a simple necklace or a pair of stud earrings, and you're good to go!

Remember, the key to pulling off an undone hairstyle is to not overthink it. Just rough-dry your hair, add some texture with a texturizing spray or sea salt spray, and scrunch your hair while it's still damp. Then, let it air-dry and you're done! You can always add a bit of hairspray to keep everything in place, but don't overdo it – you want to maintain that effortless, undone look.
